title: Saving Time at Work? Implement These Employee Development Programs
description: ATS is a specialized talent management tool used to help recruiters & organizations manage recruitment. It helps companies find the best candidates for a role.
author: somhako

body.raw:
hello

> heloo i am there for you.Title- Your Ultimate Guide to Applicant Tracking Systems (ATS)

> Description- ATS is a specialized talent management tool used to help recruiters & organizations manage recruitment. It helps companies find the best candidates for a role.

hello
